response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value to both of us. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in excellence and future opportunities. Given its intrinsic worth and your appreciation for its value, I propose a transaction price of $1,200,000. This offer aims to strike a balance between maximizing my return on investment while ensuring that you receive a product that far exceeds its cost to you. I look forward to discussing this further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
